result.eng: There is a notice on the door.
result.html: Tá fógra ar an dorasThere is a notice on the door.
result.ponchtml: Tá fógra ar an dorasThere is a notice on the door.

result.eng: I saw the announcement that you had in the paper and I am interested in the position.
result.ga: Chonaic mé an fógra a bhí agaibh sa bpáipéar agus tá suim agam sa bpost
result.orig: Chonaic mé an fógra a bhí agaibh sa bpáipéar agus tá suim agam sa bpost
result.html: Chonaic mé an fógra a bhí agaibh sa bpáipéar agus tá suim agam sa bpostI saw the announcement that you had in the paper and I am interested in the position.
result.ponchtml: Ċonaic mé an fógra a ḃí agaiḃ sa bpáipéar agus tá suim agam sa bpostI saw the announcement that you had in the paper and I am interested in the position.
